marginalia.anchor_text: Quaecunq[ue] Luna significat, circa corporis detrimenta, idem & dominus ascendentis. Quamobrem in his, qui Taurum aut Cancrum habent ascendens, sit duplicatum infortunium

position.marginalia_text: Quon[i]a[m] duplici r[ati]o[n]e ide[m] significat: se[m]per eni[m] corpori preest at maxime cu[m] ia[m] sit asce[n]de[n]t[us] d[...]

marginalia.translation: Since by the two-fold reason it signifies the same: for always it is in charge of the body and greatly when it already is [...] [...].

position.marginalia_text: Similis eni[m] genesi, et anni revolutio at debilior // vide sup[ra] fo 57.

marginalia.translation: For [it is] similar to a birth, and the revolution of a year but weaker. See above, folio 57.

underline.text: Quaecunq[ue] Luna significat, circa corporis detrimenta, idem & dominus ascendentis. Quamobrem in his, qui Taurum aut Cancrum habent ascendens, sit duplicatum infortunium
